title: DiskPulse Ultimate v8.8.16
description:
DiskPulse Ultimate v8.8.16

DiskPulse is a real-time disk change monitoring solution allowing one to monitor one or more disks or directories, save reports and disk change monitoring statistics, export detected changes to a centralized SQL database, execute custom commands and send E-Mail notifications when unauthorized changes are detected in critical system files.

Real-Time Disk Change Monitor
Analyze Detected File Changes
Filter Detected File Changes
Save Disk Monitoring Reports
SQL Database Integration
Monitor Specific File Types
Send E-Mail Notifications
Execute Custom Actions
Command Line Utility
DiskPulse Server

Maximum Number of Files				Unlimited
Maximum Storage Capacity			Unlimited
Maximum Number of Monitors 			Unlimited
Support for Long File Names 			Yes
Support for Unicode File Names			Yes
Monitor Multiple Disks or Directories		Yes
User-Selectable Monitoring Events		Yes
File Categories and File Filters		Yes
Option to Monitor Specific File Types		Yes
Option to Send E-Mail Notifications		Yes
Option to Execute Custom Commands		Yes
HTML, PDF, Excel CSV and Text Reports		Yes
Export Reports to an SQL Database		Yes
Search Changes in the Database	No		Yes
DiskPulse Command Line Utility	No		Yes
Runs in the Background as a Service		Yes
Multiple, Parallel Monitoring Operations	Yes
DiskPulse Client GUI Application		Yes
OEM Product Version 				Yes
Centralized Reports Database			Yes
Centralized Reports Analysis Rules		Yes
Disk Change Monitoring Statistics		Yes
Web-Based Management Interface			Yes
OS Native User Authentication 			Yes

Official Website: http://www.diskpulse.com/
